name: School of Agricultural and Food Engineering

departments.name: Food Process Engineering
departments.overview: Focuses on the transformation of raw agricultural products into safe, nutritious, and consumable food products using engineering principles.

departments.name: Post-Harvest Technology
departments.overview: Deals with techniques and technologies to reduce post-harvest losses, improve storage, and enhance shelf life of agricultural products.

departments.name: Agricultural Engineering
departments.overview: Applies engineering science and technology to agricultural production and processing.

name: School of Architecture and Urban Planning

departments.name: Architecture
departments.overview: Covers the art and science of designing buildings and structures with aesthetics, functionality, and sustainability in mind.

departments.name: Urban & Regional Planning
departments.overview: Focuses on the planning and development of land use in urban and rural environments.

name: School of Civil and Environmental Engineering

departments.name: Civil Engineering
departments.overview: Involves designing, constructing, and maintaining infrastructure projects like roads, bridges, and buildings.

departments.name: Hydraulic & Water Resource Engineering
departments.overview: Deals with the flow and conveyance of fluids, particularly water and sewage.

departments.name: Construction Technology & Management
departments.overview: Focuses on the planning, coordination, and control of construction projects.

name: School of Informatics and Electrical Engineering

departments.name: Computer Science
departments.overview: The CS Department is a hub for technological advancement, focusing on programming, cybersecurity, and problem-solving.

departments.name: Information Technology
departments.overview: Focuses on the application of computer systems and technology to solve business and communication problems.

departments.name: Electrical and Computer Engineering
departments.overview: Combines electrical engineering with computer science to develop computing systems and electronic devices.

name: School of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering

departments.name: Mechanical Engineering
departments.overview: Applies engineering principles to design, analyze, and manufacture mechanical systems.

departments.name: Industrial Engineering
departments.overview: Focuses on optimizing complex processes or systems to improve quality and productivity.
